title: Your Snowdown Shop returns until January 9, 2018

replies.body: Its not even available, no clickbait pls.
According to the NA post it says the 12th of December.
I swear to god if I don't get Hextech Sion I will end it all. (Its the only Sion skin I need {{item:3070}} )
it'll probably be made available at christmas, like the other non-limited legacy skins. Don't be too sad friend if snowdown shop isn't what you want, christmas is just around the corner.

You actually wont be able to get Hextech Sion as he is loot exclusive due to him only being available by getting the skin through opening chests. " Shop features up to six unique champions or skins (excluding Legendary, Limited, Loot-exclusive, and Ultimate) "
I have the Hextech Sion, but I never played that chammpion lol.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
When does the shop drop? Pls..

Snowdown isn't here for Australia and probably all of Oceania's server, yet people have got vids up on youtube 6 days ago, why the fuck is this? (and I'm not as mad as it may seem it's just in my blood to swear)
